name: ConjureQuest
description:
In the great tower of the keep, the wizards gather to enjoy a lovely cup of tea together. Tragedy strikes as a freshly prepared cup of tea is knocked over, causing the hot rich contents to spill on the table. This insult cannot be tolerated, and wizards do not settle disputes simply.  Fisticuffs are of course far too vulgar to be tolerated by these old bones and chess is far too simple for minds of this caliber, no… what we need is something more magical. . . Welcome to Conjure Quest, the game 9/10 wizards recommend to resolve quarrels by managing your magical creations on an even greater magical board.
https://sites.google.com/view/conjurequest
